mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT e.emp_no, e.email, e.password, e.name, e.img, e.dept_no, (SELECT grade FROM positions WHERE e.posi_no = posi_no) AS posiGrade, e.is_admin FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_roles er ON e.emp_no = er.emp_no WHERE e.email = #{email}
SELECT r.role_name FROM employee_roles er JOIN roles r ON er.role_id = r.role_id JOIN employees e ON er.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE e.email = #{email}
SELECT m.menu_value AS menuAuth FROM menusauth ma INNER JOIN menus m ON ma.menu_no = m.menu_no WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}

SELECT p.posi_no , e.name AS empName , p.name AS posiName , e.emp_no , d.name AS deptName FROM employees e JOIN positions p ON e.posi_no = p.posi_no JOIN departments d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no ORDER by p.posi_no
